ygData.subject: Re: Introducing Redhot (New character)
ygData.msgSnippet: Cliffjumper s relief of seeing Firedrill changed to an expression of mistrust, when he looked at the Maximal co-leader. Yeah, we re leaving, what s it to you

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Cliffjumper's relief of seeing Firedrill changed to an expression of
mistrust, when he looked at the Maximal co-leader. "Yeah, we're leaving,
what's it to you buddy." he asked, surely.
